paysServiceCharges.legend: Do you pay any service charges?

hint.caretakerServices: caretaker services like gardening, maintenance and cleaning of communal areas
hint.communalAreas: use of communal areas like a lounge or TV area

paysServiceCharges.required: Select yes if you pay any service charges.
paysServiceCharges.change: Change whether you pay any service charges

paysGroundRent.hint: You might pay ground rent if you are the leaseholder of your home.
paysGroundRent.required: Select yes if you pay ground rent.
paysGroundRent.change: Change whether you pay ground rent

getsHousingBenefit.required: Select yes if you get Housing Benefit.
getsHousingBenefit.change: Change whether you get housing benefit

wantsHousingBenefit.legend: Do you want to apply for Housing Benefit?
wantsHousingBenefit.required: Select yes if you want to apply for Housing Benefit.
wantsHousingBenefit.change: Change whether you want to apply for Housing Benefit
